definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Tea is one of the greatest cultural treasures of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 茶是中华文明最宝贵的文化财富之一。

sentences.english: The Chinese culture advocates "harmony and accord".
sentences.chinese: 中华文化有尚“和”的传统。

sentences.english: A Closing Ceremony will be held by Mandarin Class for all students and tutors.
sentences.chinese: 华文班将会在举办闭幕典礼给所有学员及教员。

sentences.english: However, culture translatability limitation has influenced the translation of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 然而文化的可译性限度却影响着中华文化的译介。

sentences.english: It shows that the tradition of "honouring the teacher and respecting his teaching" is still deeply ingrained among Chinese teachers here.
sentences.chinese: 这反映了华文教育界尊师重道的传统依然根深蒂固。

sentences.english: We are at the very beginnings of a several-hundred-year long Chinese Cultural Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 将长达几百年的中华文化复兴，现在仅刚刚开始。

sentences.english: Soon, an invisible wall begins to develop between them and Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 很快，在他们和中华文化之间就会筑起一道无形的墙。

sentences.english: Learning Chinese is like opening a widow to Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 学习汉语，就像为中华文化开了一扇窗。

sentences.english: A Chinese dragon dance was performed in Philadelphia. This is the Chinese Cultural Center at the Chinatown of Philadelphia.
sentences.chinese: 费城舞起中国龙，这是耸立费场华埠的中华文化中心。

sentences.english: In that time, there were two mains themes in Chinese literary writings.
sentences.chinese: 那时新马华文文学作品有两个主要的主题。

sentences.english: Here is Chinese Section. Please reply in Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 这里是中文论坛，请用华文回复。

sentences.english: The 5,000-year-long civilization is the source of pride of every Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 中华文明上下五千年的历史是每一个中国人的骄傲。

sentences.english: She is the Chinese educational base of Guangdong Overseas Chinese Vocational School.
sentences.chinese: 她，就是广东省华侨职业技术学校的华文教育基地。

sentences.english: Spread Chinese Culuture, Spread and Inherit Global Civilization.
sentences.chinese: 传播中华文化，传承世界文明。

sentences.english: The brilliant Big Buddha at Nanshan Mountain helps indicate the magnitude and profundity of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 金碧辉煌的南山大佛展现了中华文明的博大精深。

sentences.english: The Manager believed that this could be CCS committees' mood portrayal?
sentences.chinese: 管理人认为，这正会是华文学会筹委们的心情写照吧？

definition: Chinese language (Mandarin), emphasizing its national nature/Chinese as a primary or secondary school subject/Chinese in the context of the Nationalist Government/Guoyu, book of historical narrative c. 10th-5th century BC
sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
